about_the_game:
Ball Torture is a thrilling 2D puzzle game that puts you in control of a bowling ball on a daring mission to escape from a recycling compartment. In this challenging adventure, players must guide the rolling ball through a series of intricate levels filled with hazardous obstacles, including sharp saws and other treacherous traps.

FEATURES
  • Challenging Puzzle Gameplay: Ball Torture offers intricate and challenging puzzles, requiring players to navigate through various obstacles and hazards to reach the checkpoints.
  • Intuitive Ball Control: Players can effortlessly control the bowling ball's movement using their cursor, providing a smooth and responsive gaming experience.
  • 30 Checkpoints to Conquer: The game features 30 carefully designed checkpoints, serving as significant milestones for players to overcome in their quest for freedom.
  • Competitive Element: Players can compete against themselves, striving to beat their personal best times and enhance their skills, fostering a competitive and rewarding environment.
  • Star Collection System: As players progress through the game, they can accumulate stars, symbolizing their achievements and showcasing their prowess to the gaming community.
